coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this volume.

dimension._instruction: Enter the dimension of the first volume in this sequence.

resolution._instruction: Enter the resolution of the first volume in this sequence.

numberOfVolumes._instruction: Enter the total number of volumes in this sequence.

temporalResolution._instruction: Enter the temporal resolution of this sequence.

aquistionTime._instruction: Enter the time in which each volume have been aquierd (obligatory if temporalResolution not present)
